title: Attraction schema
description: A place or a tourist attraction in a city

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be Attraction

category.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Type of Tourist Attraction Place. Could be - Museum, Beach, Park, Amusement Park, National Park, Religious Structure, Heritage Site, Monument, Castle etc

publicAccess.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/publicAccess'. A flag to signal that the Place is open to public visitors.

photo.description: Property. URL of the image of the place. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'

video.description: Property. URL of the video of the place. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'

refSeeAlso.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'. List of references to one or more related entities.
